As far as I can see the test case is to start the quick fix from:

  URL url= new URL(plugin.getDescriptor().getInstallURL(), "en-US.dic"); <HERE>

instead of 

  URL url;
  url= new URL(plugin.getDescriptor().getInstallURL(), "en-US.dic"); <HERE>
major at least - i get it all the time
Adam, can you provide a test case then.
